name: WP Hacker News
author: Jack Slingerland

sections.description: WP Hacker News is a simple plugin that will place a “Submit to Hacker News” icon on each of your pages. Once installed, each of your posts will have this icon in the upper right-hand corner. It is only viewable when viewing an individual post, as not to clutter up site.
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-hacker-news.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enjoy!
sections.faq:
Is there a way to change the size of the icon?

Not yet. Future revisions will allow you to set the size of the icon yourself.

Can I remove the text below the icon?

If you feel like editing the source you can. Otherwise, the next revision will allow for this.
sections.changelog:
0.4

  • Fixed issue with the icon showing up on all pages and posts.

short_description: This plugin will place a "Submit to Hacker News" icon on each of your individual posts.
description: WP Hacker News is a simple plugin that will place a “Submit to Hacker News” icon on each of your pages. Once installed, each of your posts will have this icon in the upper right-hand corner. It is only viewable when viewing an individual post, as not to clutter up site.

upgrade_notice.0.4: Fixed the issue where the HN icon would show up on all pages and posts.
